title: Bell Madness
description: Bell Madness is a fun, casual game in which you test your neighbor's patience with playful antics. Knock on doors, ring doorbells, and tap on windows to witness hilarious reactions from unsuspecting neighbors. The more pranks you pull off, the more coins you earn. Use your hard-earned coins to unlock a variety of quirky doorbells with unique and amusing sounds. Plus, buy hints to uncover even more delightful surprises.
